DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate safety tolerability INS117548 ophthalmic solution .
DOC.brief_title: A Placebo-Controlled Study INS117548 Ophthalmic Solution Subjects With Glaucoma ( P08650 )
DOC.criteria: Have diagnosis bilateral ocular hypertension early primary open angle glaucoma Have best correct visual acuity eye least +0.5 good Are diagnose close angle glaucoma , exfoliation syndrome exfoliation glaucoma , pigment dispersion secondary glaucoma Have history type intraocular surgery , except cataract surgery Have cataract surgery within three month
